CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Counterparty_on_the_Contract__c, "Medical Professional"),
Primary_Contact__r.MailingStreet & ' '& Primary_Contact__r.MailingCity & ", " & Primary_Contact__r.MailingState & " " & Primary_Contact__r.MailingPostalCode & ' ' & Primary_Contact__r.MailingCountry ,
Account__r.BillingStreet & ' '& Account__r.BillingCity & ", " & Account__r.BillingState & " " & Account__r.BillingPostalCode & ' ' & Account__r.BillingCountry )
CustomField.label: Other Party Address
